short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: takes a snapshot of a page you have checked to automatically checks the buttons you access that page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension takes a snapshot of a page of radio buttons you have checked and automatically checks the buttons every time you access that page. This program is convenient for you when accessing a site where you have to check the radio buttons every time you visit.
